entity_action.description: The action to execute on the player.
entity_action.markdownDescription: The action to execute on the player.

type.description:
## Action On Land

---



[Power Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/action_on_land)

Executes an [Entity Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/action_on_land) when the player lands on the ground after being airborne.

Type ID: `origins:action_on_land`




---

### Examples

```json
{
    "type": "origins:action_on_land",
    "entity_action": {
        "type": "origins:execute_command",
        "command": "fill ~1 ~-1 ~1 ~-1 ~-1 ~-1 minecraft:air replace minecraft:grass_block"
    },
    "condition": {
        "type": "origins:fall_distance",
        "comparison": ">",
        "compare_to": 4
    }
}
```

This example will execute an [Execute Command (Entity Action Type)](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/action_on_land) that will then execute a `/fill` command that will replace a 3x3 area of Grass Blocks with Air underneath the entity's feet if the entity in question has been falling for 4 or more blocks.
